game.name: 洪荒进化 Hong Huang Evolution
game.shortDescription: A top-down lightweight Rogue-like survivor game where players take on the role of a beast capable of evolving multiple times to fend off hordes of enemies. Choose from various evolution paths, talents, and skills build, survive against all odds, and ultimately evolve into the ultimate life form.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A top-down lightweight Rogue-like survivor game where players take on the role of a beast capable of evolving multiple times to fend off hordes of enemies. Choose from various evolution paths, talents, and skills build, survive against all odds, and ultimately evolve into the ultimate life form.
